title: Digital Library of Mathematical Functions
descriptionLong: Developed WebVR demos for researchers at [NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology)](https://www.nist.gov/) to manipulate and interact with the mathematical surfaces in the [DLMF (Digital Library of Mathematical Formulae)](https://dlmf.nist.gov/) repository. Awarded the 2018 Outstanding Poster Presentation award, work presented at the SIGGRAPH 2018 BOF session [“Immersive Visualization for Research, Science and Art”](https://immersive-visualisation-bof.org/2018.html).

contents.caption: Controller interaction, object scaling, collision, and physics effects.
A simple fragment shader that sets color based on normalized position.
Enter keys 0–9 to spawn or remove surfaces.
Pan around the entire set of 3D surfaces.
